text: kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng phwk kha phraxngkh pord sng rx su l khn hnung khn dı cak phwk khea xeng pi nı hmu phwk khea sung khea ca di xan brrda xongkar khxng phraxngkh hı phwk khea fang læa ca di sxn khamphir læa khwam munghmay hæng bayyati hı phwk khea thrab læa sakfxk phwk khea hı saxad thæcring phraxngkh thrng wi sung dechanuphaph læa pricha yan
